title: Online Events Only
cleaned_text: Online Events Only For beginners & daily drop-in online meditations: While [Online events and classes](https://innerspaceharvardsq.org/calendar/) continue as usual, the Harvard Square location itself has been closed. We are pleased to inform you that post-covid in-person classes will be moved to the newly expanded and renovated Brahma Kumaris Learning Center for Peace at 75 Common St, Watertown MA 02472: Inner Space Meditation Center & Gallery aims to help people explore the true nature of mind and consciousness, experience deep peace, and to empower themselves with the tools to succeed and lead more fulfilling lives. Inner Space, where people are free to discover their own inner strengths and values, is conveniently located in Harvard Square, Cambridge. See us featured in the [Scout Cambridge Magazine (2016)](https://web.archive.org/web/20180903162940/http://scoutcambridge.com/finding-an-inner-space/) & [The Boston Globe (2018)](https://www.bostonglobe.com/metro/2018/08/04/matters-spirituality-baby-boomers-are-changing-paths-and-writing-their-own-scripts/RkNoqzWztUsDunpcwgWxGN/story.html)! Please visit our [Calendar](http://innerspaceharvardsq.org/calendar/) for timings: Meditation Room, Guided Meditations, Talks, & Raja Yoga Meditation Introductory Course
